title: Integration with Cognitive Stimulation Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to seamlessly integrate cognitive stimulation activities into the ALFRED system so that elderly users can engage in tailored mental exercises that enhance their cognitive health.

title: API for Physical Activity Tracking Applications
summary: As a developer, I want to access a robust API for physical activity tracking so that I can create applications that help older adults engage in tailored physical activities and monitor their progress effectively.

title: Support for Customizable Cognitive Games
summary: As a developer, I want to create customizable cognitive games that can adapt to the abilities and preferences of elderly users so that I can enhance their cognitive stimulation while ensuring accessibility and engagement.

title: Activity Challenge Creation Tools
summary: As a developer, I want to access tools for creating activity challenges so that I can design engaging and tailored experiences for older users that promote physical and cognitive health.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Cognitive Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a feedback mechanism for cognitive activities so that elderly users can receive performance insights and encouragement, enhancing their engagement and motivation.

title: Documentation for Physical Activity API Integration
summary: As a developer, I want comprehensive documentation for integrating physical activity APIs so that I can create scalable applications that enhance the physical well-being of elderly users.

title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to implement real-time progress tracking for users so that caregivers can receive immediate updates on users’ health metrics and intervene promptly if needed.

title: Security Measures for Activity Data Management
summary: As a developer, I want to implement robust security measures for managing activity data so that I can ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and protect user privacy.
